name: The Switcher (Charlie Taylor)
description:
Submission for the Global Game Jam 2022

Hold and Release Space to Jump

A and D to rotate, just be sure to land correctly or you'll lose.

Press Q to swap between Night and Day to pass through obstacles

Just get to to the end of the level, and have fun!

(Source Code included but please for your own sanity don't look at it, it is disgusting. enjoy!)
GGJ Link: https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/switcher-9
